Class DistanceMeasure

  • Constructor Details

    • DistanceMeasure

      public DistanceMeasure(double[] position, double[] friction, double[] hole, double radius, boolean reachedHole)
      Constructor for the class of the Rule-Based bot.
      Parameters:
      position - Position of the ball.
      friction - Frictions of the Surfaces.
      hole - Position of the hole.
      radius - Radius of the hole.
      reachedHole - True if the ball has reached the hole, false otherwise.

  • Method Details

    • calculateDirection

      public static double[] calculateDirection(double[] start, double[] end)
      Calculates the direction / angle from the ball position to the hole.
      Parameters:
      start - The position of the Hole.
      end - The position of the Ball.
      Returns:
      A vector containing the direction.

    • assumeVelocity

      public double assumeVelocity(double[] x)
      This method chooses a velocity based on certain rules.
      Parameters:
      x - The position of the ball.
      Returns:
      the "assumed" velocity.

    • getBallStatus

      public BallStatus getBallStatus()
      Gets the current status of the ball.
      Returns:
      The status of the ball.

    • lastShot

      public double[] lastShot(double[] x, double[] hole)
      This Method calculates the last shot, which is used, when the ball is 5m away from the hole.
      Parameters:
      x - The position of the Ball.
      hole - The position of the Hole.
      Returns:
      The array containing the information containing the position and Velocity for the last shot.

    • createVelocityVectors

      public double[][] createVelocityVectors(double[] direction)
      This method creates Velocity vectors.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction from the position to the hole.
      Returns:
      An array containing all the Velocity vectors.

    • checkHole

      public boolean checkHole(double[] x, double[] hole)
      Checks if the ball is a certain distance away from the hole.
      Parameters:
      x - The position of the Ball.
      hole - The position of the Hole.
      Returns:
      True if the ball is closer than 1m to the hole, false otherwise.

    • getOnePlay

      public double[] getOnePlay(double[] position, double[] hole)
      Calculates one play for the Rule based bot based on the distance to the hole after the play
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the ball.
      hole - The position of the hole.
      Returns:
      A list containing the best play from the position (velocityX, velocityY, power)

    • checkInHole

      public boolean checkInHole(double[] position, double[] hole)
      Checks if the Ball is in the hole.
      Parameters:
      position - Position of the ball.
      hole - Position of the hole.
      Returns:
      True if ball is in hole, false otherwise.

    • playGame

      public ArrayList<double[]> playGame(double[] position, double[] hole, boolean reachedHole)
      This method "plays" the game and creates a list of trajectories.
      Parameters:
      position - Position of the Ball.
      hole - Position of the hole.
      reachedHole - Boolean condition: True if the hole is reached, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      List containing the plays necessary to reach the goal.

    • getDuration

      public double getDuration()
      Gets the duration of the algorithm execution.
      Returns:
      the duration in seconds

    • isGoal

      public boolean isGoal()
      Checks if the goal has been reached.
      Returns:
      true if the goal is reached, false otherwise
